alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Jefferson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Emanuel and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1025 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Dellwood, or near Swainsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Wadley, Twin City, Stillmore, Garfield, Summertown, Nunez, Covena, Modoc, Canoochee, Blundale, Three Points, Dellwood, Lexsy, Colemans Lake and George L Smith State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
